overview: Adapted from Shigeru Mizuki's classic manga from the 1960s, 'Kappa no Sanpei', the anime tells a story of a young boy, Sanpei, who lives in the beautiful countryside with his grandfather. One day, he is caught in the muddy streams of the river and wakes up in the land of goblins. Sanpei makes friends with a goblin named Gartaro, who bears striking resemblance to himself. Thus, the adventure begins.
title: Kappa no Sanpei

overview: Tracklist:  01. It' s a Heartache  02. Here Am I  03. Lost in France  04. Married Men  05. My Guns Are Loaded  06. Heaven  07. Have You Ever Seen The Rain  08. Goodbye To The Island  09. Holding Out For a Hero  10. Total Eclipse of The Heart  11. Loving You' s a Dirty Job  12. Here She Comes  13. Fools Lullaby  14. From The Bottom Of My Lonely Heart  15. title: Bonnie Tyler - The Video Hits Collection

overview: Grace leaves her old folks' home to return to her birthplace in Lambeth, a place which has changed on the surface but at its heart is still the same.
title: Waterloo Sunset

overview: What do you do when life reaches a dead end? Giving up is an option, but certainly not the only or the best option.
title: Onaatah

overview: No overview found
title: Lisetta Carmi, un'anima in cammino

overview: No overview found
title: L'oro di Cuba

overview: The lowest paid teachers in the nation are in the middle of a statewide walkout in Oklahoma. From start to finish, Walkout follows the teachers as they get organized and demand raises from their state legislature. From crowded classrooms to a packed state capitol, Walkout offers an in-depth, personal look at the latest strike at the heart of a nationwide movement for education funding.
title: Walkout: The School Funding Rebellion

overview: Tracklist:  1. Mean To Me  2. Now We're Getting Somewhere  3. Don't Dream It's Over  4. World Where You Live  5. Something So Strong  6. Better Be Home Soon  7. When You Come  8. Into Temptation  9. Sister Madly  10. I Feel Possessed  11. Chocolate Cake  12. Fall At Your Feet  13. It's Only Natural  14. Weather With You  15. Four Seasons In One Day  16. Distant Sun  17. Better Be Home Soon (Live ARIA Awards 2005)
title: Crowded House - The Very Very Best Of 2010

overview: 16mm, 4min, colour, sound Experimantal montage film from Thomas Drashchan
title: Yes? Oui? Ja?

overview: An animated short film about Aber and a vendor during a market visit.
title: ABER – Saken

overview: A convicted felon builds a feminist movement from behind bars at an all-male prison in Soledad, California.
title: The Feminist on Cellblock Y

overview: At 21, Zoe is sick and tired of everyone taking her for granted, just because she’s young. She dreams of a day when all millennials go on strike, so that people finally recognize their true value.
title: Les Affamés

overview: The Movie is a kind of tale, a look at a not so distant past that will allow everyone to make a judgment on the behavior of all the actors of this slice of history, of those who fought with courage and dignity. Those who took advantage and fortune.
title: Les amis d'hier

overview: On the eve of the 1919 revolution in Egypt, the friendship between Houda al-Najjar, who likes boxing, Petro, who likes to sing, and the good worker of the printing press, believes in revolution. Fatima, the sister of Houda, is in love with Hussain, and they marry. The revolution takes place, and Houda dreams of shaking hands with its leader, Saad Zaghloul, and dreams of participating in the 1924 Olympics as a boxer. Hasan is imprisoned for his involvement in resisting the British occupation, and Huda is married to a neighbor of Hanifa. Hassan was killed by the Israeli occupation forces and Houda was able to participate in the Olympics
title: The Champion

overview: The leader of a gang of notorious criminals in Almaty, Kazakhstan defends himself in court, is sentenced to ten years in prison, organizes the country's first prison cooperative, and, after his release, becomes arm wrestling champion of the USSR.
title: Champion Number One

overview: Re-live the Cavaliers' championship run from the first day of training through their historic comeback at the 2016 NBA Finals. This is the amazing, first- hand story of the 2015-16 Cleveland Cavaliers and an unforgettable season to believe.
title: 2015-16 NBA Champions - Cleveland Cavaliers

overview: Billie #hatesherjob and quits mere months before getting married. She meets a ragtag group of women also looking for employment, and finds herself juggling her upcoming wedding with launching a new tech start-up.
title: Freelancers Anonymous

overview: 4 stories about 4 criminal children. Two teenagers trapped in a world full of drugs and human trafficking, another two kids bring their loved ones to the limit, other two resentful kids want to fulfill their most evil desires, and one kid who has to decide between killing or loving.
title: Murderous Children

overview: ZOR is a swashbuckling fantasy-sci set in the far future that tells the tragicomedy of two brothers and a series of bungled betrayals.
title: ZOR

overview: In a forest clearing, any number of transformations can occur.
title: Zyklus I

overview: A meteorite, strange vegetation, a colour: an experimental take on H.P. Lovecraft's spiral into madness, shot with a vintage camera on truly unique LomoChrome 16mm film.
title: The Colour Out of Space

overview: This story revolves around Tamil and Srgnt. Kumar saving a family from a shaman (Tinaya). Both of them faced lots of hassles and danger while protecting them.
title: Vettai Karuppar Ayya

overview: When the body's "primal" urges feel deprived in a "modern" age, a debate about "sex" and "love" ensues to resolve the question — perhaps even find some solution that will suffice!
title: Street Meat

overview: Jean-Paul is a Frenchman who yearns to live in communist Czechoslovakia. His wish is granted when, mistaken as a masseur of a French boating team, he manages to elude the democratic authorities long enough to scamper over the Czech border.
title: Provisional Liberty

overview: Music video for the song "Himitsu" by A Crow is White.
title: Himitsu Spark

overview: The iconic Finke Desert Race, the largest off-road motorsport event in the southern hemisphere and Australia's fastest, deadliest, toughest and certainly dustiest race. Filmed over three years, Finke explores the race from within – competitors, organisers, paramedics, and the drive to win against the desert at all costs.  Finke is a visual adventure of inspiration and danger, excitement and spills.
title: Finke: There and Back

overview: Our host Ben Ferguson and director Marc Isaacs travel to the Lincolnshire town of Boston to reveal a local story about communal fears about change and immigration.
title: Outsiders

overview: The stage director of the play L’œuf de Pâquesis given the importante Molière award. Taking this reward for a bad joke, he thinks that a conspiracy mounts against him and decides to rewrite the play, transforming it into Molière’s La critique de l’École des femmes.
title: Fifi Martingale

overview: A documentary about U2 and their fans.
title: Dream Out Loud

overview: A pioneer of indie music, Sarah Blasko walks the line between commercial success and artistic integrity with dignity. Narrated by Sarah herself, this film is an intimate portrait of the artist as she writes her new album.
title: Blasko

overview: In search of transcendence through stone skipping, an idealistic drifter arrives in a quiet lakeside town. Facing resistance from unimpressed locals, and pursued by members of his former skipping crew, he is forced to consider the merit of his lifelong quest.
title: Skippers

overview: Mist on the Moors examines fates of just about a few people. Their stories are outlined in a short space of time and are a symbolic representation of the drama of life, struggle for justice, human cognizance and the healing power of love. One of the most important components of the film is the nature, which ceases to be a mere stage for its plot—it serves almost as an autonomous plot agent. The movie landscape is a precisely defined and localized one. Only the South Bohemian ponds can serve as the right environment for development of such earthy and typically human stories as we encounter in the Mist on the Moors.
title: Mist on the Moors

overview: The director follows three art college students HUANG Yong-song, MOU Tun-fei, and HUANG Gui-rong as they enjoy an excursion into the mountains. As the song ‘California Dreamin’ plays, the three talk about their artistic ideals, how only KMT party members were eligible for scholarships, and their view on the Vietnam War.
title: The Mountain

overview: Josefina, a radical homemaker, committed a crime of passion that led her to self-exile at a coastal town. She tries to find peace in solitude, immersed in the house routine, while coexisting with a past of lovers and Molotov cocktails. Her body suffers the metamorphosis of aging, and she must undergo cataract surgery.
title: Nona

overview: A quirky story about two Midwest farm towns and the value their twine balls represent. Francis Johnson of Minnesota and Fran Storber of Kansas go head-to-head in a Battle of the Balls for over half a century.
title: The World's largest Ball of Twine.

overview: Four days prior to being diagnosed with a malignant lung tumor, Luther Allison played a blistering show in Montreal; it was filmed for later airplay on Canadian television, and most of the show is captured on this DVD. The bitter irony is obvious here -- Allison is at the peak of his powers, and yet at the same time, it could be said that he's playing like a man with only weeks to live. Performers include: Luther Allison: lead guitar, vocals; James Solberg: rhythm & lead guitar; Mike Vlahakis: keyboards; Ken Faltinson: bass; Robb Stupka: drums; and Memphis Horns (Wayne Jackson, Andrew Love).
title: Luther Allison: Songs from the Road

overview: After the premature death of her estranged husband, Emma (Winter) regains custody of their young daughter Isla (Jones) and hopes to rebuild their relationship after many years apart. But when an evil entity begins to torment them, mother and daughter are forced to face the inexplicable presence that inhabits the walls of their new home.
title: You're Not Alone

overview: The Red Bridge is Falling Down is a film by Daiki Morinaga. A student movie from Tokyo University of the Arts.
title: The Red Bridge is Falling Down

overview: The Body Swap Center is a movie by Kazuki Sekiguchi. A student movie from Tokyo University of the Arts.
title: The Body Swap Center

overview: Jinxes is a movie by Yuki Maehata. A student movie from Tokyo University of the Arts.

overview: fruits is a movie by Takahiro Shibata. A student movie from Tokyo University of the Arts.

overview: 20 years later, a look back at Cubs pitcher Kerry Wood's 20-strikeout game.

This historic official film from Major League Baseball presents the exciting story of the Chicago Cubs 2016 World Series championship run through comprehensive highlights, exclusive access and interviews, and breathtaking footage.
title: 2016 World Series Champions: The Chicago Cubs

overview: A vicious killer is on the loose, taking lives left and right with seemingly no motive.  This short film was featured as an extra on The Dirties' DVD.
title: The Visitor

overview: Alright, well, this movie doesn't have much of a plot so I don't have much to say here...but I can tell you that in this movie, I bang LOTS and lots of people - and let me tell you, it was awesome. For the past few years, I've just been teasing you. Consider everything you have ever seen me do in the past as like, foreplay to what you're about to see here!
title: XOXO Joanna Angel

overview: A fugitive priest seeks shelter with a small family in an old farmhouse where he must conceal his true identity or face the ultimate punishment.
title: A Man of God

overview: Anne: Journey to Green Gables is an imaginative, animated prequel to the Live action Anne of Green Gables films. In this brand new story, Anne has yet to go to Green Gables and dreams of having a family of her own. But as fate would have it, she is thrown into the clutches of Madame Poubelle, the faded aristocratic director of Grout Orphanage. It takes all of Anne's scope for the imagination for her to endure until she gets to Green Gables.
title: Anne: Journey to Green Gables

overview: Life Is is a documentary about Todd Shaw, a rapper better known as Too $hort.
title: Life Is: The Life and Times of Todd Shaw

overview: About someone who once loved a woman in a desert with a camera.
title: Límites: 1ª persona

overview: About U-Boat 39 the first U-Boat sunk in WW2 by the UK Carrier Ark Royal.
title: Ubåt 39

overview: Wealthy hedonist Budiman turns an inherited property into a brothel, where he rapes girls and turns them into prostitutes when he isn't bartering their services for drugs. An abortion forced upon one of the girls unleashes the spirit of her unborn child, who begins to haunt the establishment.
title: Soul of the Magical Child

overview: Documentary following three families each coping with a child affected by serious emotional or mental illness. The families explore treatment opportunities and grapple with the struggle of living with their child's condition.
title: A Dangerous Son

overview: A train arrives in Cologne Central Station and employees and travellers are seen on the platform.
title: Arrivée de l'express

overview: The life in a village after Amina returns as Abdurahiman
title: Irattajeevitham

overview: Toting a couple of guns and a paper sack full of money, three bank robbers search for a hideout. Cut to the interior of the girl's apartment: the gangsters rush in brandishing their rods.
title: Virgin Hostage

overview: Unadventurous office worker Hannah and her childhood friend Trixie's world is turned upside down when the ghost of her late sister appears; guiding them on a road trip to scatter her ashes at a destination she once sought but never found. What starts off as a simple journey turns into an unpredictable adventure and the two friends must overcome their sheltered existence and find out who they really are and what they are truly capable of.
title: Just Between Us

overview: She was predicted the future of russian Coco Chanel of 21st century – untill her car accident. Consequences of a strong trauma fenced Nastya off  from the whole world. But she doesn't intend to change the former way of life, to go on compromises in search of the life’s partner  or to reduce the level of her claims.
title: Who will be my husband?

overview: 2011-2012. Swamp area. Protesting moods. The 22-year-old Dasha goes to the polls - to the municipal deputies of the Brateevo district of Moscow. She is not a member of any party, and her electoral fund is 15,000 rubles, given by her mother.  This is how Dasha begins his political career. Two years passed. Career is shaping up. What can not you tell about personal life: it seems that the family and political success for the girl are incompatible things ...
title: Independent

overview: Short film by Hannes Stöhr that was developed into a feature film two years later.
title: Berlin is in Germany

overview: An odd ménage à trois results when a woman and her lover are visited by her long-lost husband.
title: The Fox Trot

overview: A comic book storekeeper, Dae-man, and the legendary homicide detective, Tae-su, who met on previous case quit their jobs to open a private detective agency.
title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action

overview: Shotru (English: Enemy) is a 2011 Bengali action film directed by Raj Chakraborty and starring Jeet, Supriyo Dutta and Nusrat Jahan, who gave her debut by this film. This film was produced by Ashok Dhanuka of Eskay Movies who also distributed it. The movie is a remake of the Tamil film Singam which starred Surya and ...
title: Enemy

overview: 'A Mediocre Time' with Tom and Dan' was becoming a hit podcast...until big radio made them shut it down. Now, after quitting their terrestrial radio jobs and making the podcast a career, they will embark on their biggest event yet: showcasing their podcast at the Hard Rock Live!
title: A Mediocre Documentary with Tom And Dan

overview: A collection of European T.V. commercials directed by a variety of well-known directors from across Europe and the U.S. Compiled and produced by Jean-Marie Boursicot.
title: The King of Ads

overview: Story follows the daily lives of 8 women with different backgrounds, including Atsuko Mochitsuki (Kyoko Koizumi), through what they eat and whom they date. --asianwiki
title: Women Who Eat

overview: Girl of the Big House is a Hong Kong Comedy starring Francis Ng
title: Girl of the Big House

overview: Documentary film about the life and work of Swedish filmmaker Ingmar Bergman, who would have turned 100 on July 14, 2018. Margarethe von Trotta and Felix Moeller trace Bergman's life in a very personal manner.
title: Searching for Ingmar Bergman

overview: A focuses on 1957, one of the most prolific years for the Swedish director. During the year he shot two films, opened two of his most celebrated films (The Seventh Seal and Wild Strawberries), and produced four plays and a TV movie while juggling with a complicated private life.
title: Bergman: A Year in a Life

overview: Five friends, a love of film and a suicide pact.  In Tolkein lore, Astron-6 is the day of the Elvish New Year.  And a New Year is upon us indeed… From their first meeting at the Winnipeg Short Film Massacre, the five men instantly found themselves embroiled in a deadly game of cat and mouse. Rather than desroy each other, the sworn enemies decided to unite and then destroy themselves (once famous).  Astron-6 is the brainchild of these five iconoclastic, multi-media artiests who share a fascination with the emchanics of fear and laughter.  They subvert the expectations of the seasoned viewer with the nightmarish and absurd.  Their imagery and recurring themes are often torn from the childhood of the irony-craving, internet savvy Generations X and Y.  That is, they often lampoon genre films of the 1980’s.
title: Astron-6

overview: An old couple is looking forward to a visit from their son. The father cuts a tree so that his son could park his car.
title: Raiz

overview: Magnum live on 13th May 1985 Camden Palace, London.  Tracklist: 1	How Far Jerusalem  2	Before The First Light  3	On A Story Teller's Night  4	All England's Eyes  5	Les Morts Dansant  6	Just Like An Arrow  7	The Lights Burned Out  8	Endless Love  9	Two Hearts  10	Soldier Of Love  11	Kingdom Of Madness  12	The Sacred Hour
title: Magnum - Live from London

overview: Following a car accident, which kills her mother, 17-year-old Ida moves in with her estranged aunt and her aunt’s grown sons. The home is filled with physical tenderness and love, but outside of the home, the family leads a violent and criminal life.
title: Wildland

overview: Confronted by odd directive from her late husband's estate, Helena Grayson is inspired to reawaken a long-buried desire to write. When she's unexpectedly drawn into an encounter with an old flame she is further challenged to explore her creative voice. Conceived under the sway of both love and art Into Invisible Light is a story of forgiveness, second chances and the revitalizing power of art.
title: Into Invisible Light

overview: In 1923 a Japanese comes to Munich and immediately falls in love with a street artist with a red hat, without knowing her past is. She turns to the Japanese, for the first time she thinks she has found her really great love- exotic stranger attracts her. They say a lot, but they do not understand each other - but they can show their love. Nevertheless, the relationship is doomed to failure from the beginning. Disappointment, death and loss.
title: Woman with the Red Hat

overview: A World War II American pilot hatches a plan to use a cow to help him avoid capture and find his way across Germany to freedom.
title: The Cow

overview: It's time to mow down that hot step-sister's muff! Dive in and get to work, it's jungle like no other!
title: Bush Wackin' Stepsister's Muff

overview: Kate and Joe have longed to be parents and are considering in vitro options... when Danica, a child Kate gave up 17 years ago, appears on Facebook. Danica comes to live with them, but she's not their real child. She's an impostor who will do anything, even kill, to get the mother's love she never had.
title: The Wrong Daughter

overview: When Zhao Xiaoyi passes the entrance exam to enroll as an art student, it’s more to her than a chance to pursue her creative dreams. After years of close supervision at home, it also means freedom and independence. Away at school at last, a lonelier Zhao finds there may be more to miss at home than there is to discover on her own. Meanwhile, things are not all well with her mom, as career troubles and domestic problems collide to overwhelm her.
title: I Am Your Mom

overview: A woman goes to see a movie to which she appears to have a strange connection.
title: The Abyss of Man

overview: In CINEVANGELIST: A LIFE IN REVIVAL FILM, film historian and artist George Figgs tells the story of his life's work in bringing revival cinema to Baltimore and beyond.
title: Cinevangelist: A Life in Revival Film

overview: When John Rambo's niece travels to Mexico to find the father that abandoned her and her mother, she finds herself in the grasps of Calle Mexican sex traffickers. When she doesn't return home as expected, John learns she's crossed into Mexico and sets out to get her back and make them pay.
title: Rambo: Last Blood
Rene Liu Renext I dare 2017 world tour

overview: Jim is afraid of everything. In order to face his fears, Jim will bring everything he is afraid of into his house. It doesn't quite work out as expected..
title: Shock Therapy

overview: SOUND DOCUMENTARY  On April 27, 1968, workers from the Rhodiaceta factory in Besançon gathered at the village hall of Palente-les-Orchamps to attend the screening of the film À bientôt j'espoir by Mario Marret and Chris Marker. This documentary sound reproduces the critical debate that follows. In June 1969, at the end of the Wrestling Class , Pol Cèbe, the head of the Cultural Center of Palente-les-Orchamps, brings to the sound document a conclusion in the form of a report. Echoing an intense debate after the screening of To Soon I Hope , the movie The Hinge of Medvedkine Groups captures very well those moments when workers express their dissatisfaction with the way they were portrayed.
title: La Charnière

overview: Singer Ruth Eton is looking for some new songs to use in her act. Don Hopkins is a songwriter who wants to break into the business, but knows it is difficult to get music publishers to consider new talent. Don sees Ruth having dinner at a night club and asks for her help. —David Glagovsky
title: Words & Music

overview: The stone-cutter, Nasdika, transforms stones into works of art. The labourer, Ivané, harvests wheat in the field. The monk, Béka, paints his pictures in the convent cell. The nobleman, Kirilé, has decided to get married. The war started by enemies turns all these people into warriors. Living Legends is a parable, a hymn to the glory of the georgian people, enamoured of freedom and independence, whose most worthy sons have never hesitated to die in the name of the glorious future of their country.
title: Living Legends

overview: The International Space Station is now a prison - the ultimate black site. No one's getting out. And no one knows it's there. But when the imprisoned terrorists take over the Station and turn it into a missile aimed at Moscow, only a shuttle pilot and a rookie doctor can stop them. Their task is complicated by a rogue CIA agent (Scott Adkins) who has his own plans for the station and the terrorists within.
title: Incoming

overview: No overview found
title: A Night of Love

overview: Officer comes home from the Revolution to discover that he's been declared dead and that his wife has remarried and given his lands to another man.
title: El derecho y el deber

overview: Plunging into a netherworld of machines and humans, Steklarski Blues (2001), also known as Glazier Blues, transforms the noisy, steam-filled work of a glass factory in the town of Hrastnik in Slovenia into something resembling a steampunk-inflected, sci-fi dystopia that belongs to no particular moment in time.
title: Glazier Blues

overview: The story is about a mysterious event that changes fates of a dreamy young Russian woman, a middle-aged American DJ and a pregnant Romanian.
title: Turbo

overview: Ambika, little Ishu's favourite aunt, has gone missing after the evil village quack has declared her as a witch. Will Ishu get her back
title: Ishu

overview: During an afternoon session of drinks and shots a group of people decides to visit a house which is claimed to be populated by evil spirits.
title: Inside Evil

overview: 4 women exploring love

The Search for Alfred the Great
overview: Neil Oliver is given exclusive access to a team of historians and scientists investigating the final resting place of Alfred the Great. Alfred's bones have been moved so many times over the centuries that many...
